description: Impact Briefing — Capitol Fund Quarterly Update

backFields.label: About This Event
backFields.value:
Join us for the Capitol Fund Quarterly Update — an Impact Briefing showcasing our regenerative capital framework progress. This event is exclusive to LIFT Certificate Early Adopters (Series 2025Q4).

Learn about:
• Regenerative Capital Framework
• Capitol Fund Investment Strategy
• Community Impact Metrics
• Q4 2025 Performance Review

backFields.label: Venue Details
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
Frederick, Maryland

Walking distance from downtown Frederick. Parking available on-site.

backFields.label: Your Certificate
backFields.value: This LIFT Certificate represents your participation in Exchange Reserve's regenerative capital framework. As an Early Adopter, you have priority access to Impact Briefings and exclusive community events.

backFields.label: Contact
backFields.value:
hello@exchangereserve.org

Questions? Email us or visit:
https://exchangereserve.org

backFields.label: Certificate Verification
backFields.value:
Scan the QR code on the front of this pass to verify authenticity and view your certificate details online.

Serial Number: LIFT-2025-AB12-V2

locations.relevantText: Welcome to Bell Tower Hall! Your Impact Briefing starts soon.
